short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build an Extension to Easy access GCP serivices!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are using GCP in a daily base, then you may need faster access. I built this simple extension to safe few seconds that I spend in browsing and redirecting to the required resources home. Simple click to redirect you to the service home. More helpful for Data Engineers like me.
